<tab:logische-Saetze-3>3. Tabelle der logischen Sätze 
]

     
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                             Bezeichnung                                               |                                 Satz                                   |                                                                                                                                  logischer Satz                                                                                                                                   |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                       Äquivalenz‑Negationssatz                                        |                   [prop:Aequivalenz-Negations-Satz]                    |                                                                            \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\Leftrightarrow B\right) & \Leftrightarrow\\
\left(\neg A\Leftrightarrow\neg B\right)
\end{array}                                                                             |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                      Äquivalenz‑Antivalenzsatz                                        |                  [prop:Aequivalenz-Antivalenz-Satz]                    |                                                                       \begin{array}{cc}
\neg\left(A\Leftrightarrow B\right) & \Leftrightarrow\\
\phantom{\neg}\left(A\nLeftrightarrow B\right)
\end{array}                                                                        |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|            \begin{array}{c}
\text{aus Antivalenz}\\
\text{folgt Disjunktion}
\end{array}              |               [prop:Implikation-Antivalenz-Disjunktion]                |                                                                                              \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\nLeftrightarrow B\right) & \Rightarrow\\
A\vee B
\end{array}                                                                                               |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                   \text{Negation-Implikationssatz}                                    |                    [prop:Negation-der-Implikation]                     |                                                                                          \begin{array}{cc}
\neg\left(A\Rightarrow B\right) & \Leftrightarrow\\
A\wedge\neg B
\end{array}                                                                                          |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                         Satz der Trivialität                                          |                      [prop:Trivialitaet-Aussage]                       |                                                                                                                            \neg A\wedge A\Rightarrow B                                                                                                                            |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|            \begin{array}{c}
\text{Satz der zyklischen}\\
\text{Implikationen}
\end{array}             |                 [prop:Satz-zyklischer-Implikationen]                   |   \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\Rightarrow B\right) & \wedge\\
\left(B\Rightarrow C\right) & \wedge\\
\left(C\Rightarrow A\right) & \Rightarrow\\
\left(A\Leftrightarrow B\right) & \wedge\\
\left(B\Leftrightarrow C\right) & \wedge\\
\left(C\Leftrightarrow A\right)
\end{array}   |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{verschärfter}\\
\text{Satz der zyklischen}\\
\text{Implikationen}
\end{array}  | [prop:zyklische-Implikation-von-drei-Aussagen-aequivalent-Aequvalenz]  | \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\Rightarrow B\right) & \wedge\\
\left(B\Rightarrow C\right) & \wedge\\
\left(C\Rightarrow A\right) & \Leftrightarrow\\
\left(A\Leftrightarrow B\right) & \wedge\\
\left(B\Leftrightarrow C\right) & \wedge\\
\left(C\Leftrightarrow A\right)
\end{array} |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|           \begin{array}{c}
\text{Kommutativität der}\\
\text{NAND-Verknüpfung}
\end{array}            |                        [prop:Kommutation-NAND]                         |                                                                                             \begin{array}{cc}
A\overline{\wedge}B & \Leftrightarrow\\
B\overline{\wedge}A
\end{array}                                                                                             |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|       \begin{array}{c}
\text{disjunktive Normalform}\\
\text{der NAND-Verknüpfung}
\end{array}        |                     [prop:Konjunktion-NAND-Satz]                       |                                                                            \begin{array}{cc}
\neg\left(A\wedge B\right) & \Leftrightarrow\\
\phantom{\neg}\left(A\overline{\wedge}B\right)
\end{array}                                                                            |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|       \begin{array}{c}
\text{disjunktive Normalform}\\
\text{der NOR-Verknüpfung}
\end{array}         |            [prop:disjunktive-Normalform-NOR-Verknuepfung]              |                                                                                                       \left(A\overline{\vee}B\right)\Leftrightarrow\neg\left(A\vee B\right)                                                                                                       |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|           \begin{array}{c}
\text{konjunktive Normalform}\\
\text{Implikation}
\end{array}             |               [prop:konjunktive-Normalform-Implikation]                |                                                                                            \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\Rightarrow B\right) & \Leftrightarrow\\
\neg A\vee B
\end{array}                                                                                             |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|           \begin{array}{c}
\text{konjunktive Normalform}\\
\text{Replikation}
\end{array}             |               [cor:konjunktive-Normalform-Replikation]                 |                                                                                             \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\Leftarrow B\right) & \Leftrightarrow\\
A\vee\neg B
\end{array}                                                                                              |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|             \begin{array}{c}
\text{1. Abkürzungsregel}\\
\text{Implikation}
\end{array}               |                 [cor:1.-Abkuerzugsregel-Implikation]                   |                                                                                                                   \neg A\Rightarrow\left(A\Rightarrow B\right)                                                                                                                    |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|             \begin{array}{c}
\text{2. Abkürzungsregel}\\
\text{Implikation}
\end{array}               |                 [cor:2.-Abkuerzugsregel-Implikation]                   |                                                                                                                      B\Rightarrow\left(A\Rightarrow B\right)                                                                                                                      |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|          \begin{array}{c}
\text{konjunktive Normalform}\\
\text{der Äquivalenz}
\end{array}           |               [prop:konjunktive-Normalform-Aequivalenz]                |                                                                              \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\Leftrightarrow B\right) & \Leftrightarrow\\
\neg A\wedge\neg B & \vee\\
A\wedge B
\end{array}                                                                              |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
     
]

|    \begin{array}{c}
\text{konjunktive Normalform}\\
\text{der Antivalenz}
\end{array}     |     [prop:konjunktive-Normalform-Antivalenz]      |                                \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\Leftrightarrow B\right) & \Leftrightarrow\\
\neg A\wedge B & \vee\\
A\wedge\neg B
\end{array}                                 |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}

\text{der NAND-Verknüpfung}
\end{array}  | [prop:konjunktive-Normalform-NAND-Verknuepfung]   | \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\overline{\wedge}B\right) & \Leftrightarrow\\
\neg A\wedge\neg B & \vee\\
\phantom{\neg}A\wedge\neg B & \vee\\
\neg A\wedge\phantom{\neg}B & \vee
\end{array} |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{konjunktive Normalform}\\
\text{der NOR-Verknüpfung}
\end{array}   |  [prop:konjunktive-Normalform-NOR-Verknuepfung]   |                                          \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\overline{\vee}B\right) & \Leftrightarrow\\
\neg A\wedge\neg B
\end{array}                                           |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|          \begin{array}{c}
\text{1. Minimumsatz}\\
\text{der Logik}
\end{array}            |        [lem:Minimum-Maximum-Saetze-Logik]         |                   \begin{array}{cc}
A\wedge\left(B\wedge\neg B\right) & \Leftrightarrow\\
\phantom{A\wedge}\left(B\wedge\neg B\right) & \Leftrightarrow
\end{array}                    |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|          \begin{array}{c}
\text{2. Minimumsatz}\\
\text{der Logik}
\end{array}            |        [lem:Minimum-Maximum-Saetze-Logik]         |                     \begin{array}{cc}
A\wedge\left(B\vee\neg B\right) & \Leftrightarrow\\
A\phantom{\wedge\left(B\vee\neg B\right)} & \Leftrightarrow
\end{array}                      |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|          \begin{array}{c}
\text{1. Maximumsatz}\\
\text{der Logik}
\end{array}            |        [lem:Minimum-Maximum-Saetze-Logik]         |                     \begin{array}{cc}
A\vee\left(B\wedge\neg B\right) & \Leftrightarrow\\
A\phantom{\vee\left(B\wedge\neg B\right)} & \Leftrightarrow
\end{array}                      |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|          \begin{array}{c}
\text{2. Maximumsatz}\\
\text{der Logik}
\end{array}            |        [lem:Minimum-Maximum-Saetze-Logik]         |                     \begin{array}{cc}
A\vee\left(B\wedge\neg B\right) & \Leftrightarrow\\
A\phantom{\vee\left(B\wedge\neg B\right)} & \Leftrightarrow
\end{array}                      |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|    \begin{array}{c}
\text{1. erweiterter }\\
\text{Minimumsatz der Logik}
\end{array}     | [lem:erweiterte-Minimum-Maximumsaetze-der-Logik]  |                     \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\Leftrightarrow\left(B\wedge\neg B\right)\right) & \Rightarrow\\
\left(A\Leftrightarrow C\wedge A\right)
\end{array}                      |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|    \begin{array}{c}
\text{2. erweiterter }\\
\text{Minimumsatz der Logik}
\end{array}     | [lem:erweiterte-Minimum-Maximumsaetze-der-Logik]  |                      \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\Leftrightarrow\left(B\vee\neg B\right)\right) & \Rightarrow\\
\left(C\Leftrightarrow C\wedge A\right)
\end{array}                       |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|    \begin{array}{c}
\text{1. erweiterter }\\
\text{Maximumsatz der Logik}
\end{array}     | [lem:erweiterte-Minimum-Maximumsaetze-der-Logik]  |                      \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\Leftrightarrow\left(B\wedge\neg B\right)\right) & \Rightarrow\\
\left(C\Leftrightarrow C\vee A\right)
\end{array}                       |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|    \begin{array}{c}
\text{2. erweiterter }\\
\text{Maximumsatz der Logik}
\end{array}     | [lem:erweiterte-Minimum-Maximumsaetze-der-Logik]  |                       \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\Leftrightarrow\left(B\vee\neg B\right)\right) & \Rightarrow\\
\left(A\Leftrightarrow C\vee A\right)
\end{array}                        |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|         \begin{array}{c}
\text{Zusammenhang}\\
\text{Negation-NAND}
\end{array}           |        [prop:Zusammenhang-Negation-NAND]          |                                        \begin{array}{cc}
\neg A & \Leftrightarrow\\
\phantom{\neg}\left(A\overline{\wedge}A\right)
\end{array}                                         |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|         \begin{array}{c}
\text{Zusammenhang}\\
\text{Identität-NAND}
\end{array}          |       [prop:Zusammenhang-Identitaet-NAND]         |                         \begin{array}{cc}
A & \Leftrightarrow\\
\left(A\overline{\wedge}A\right)\overline{\wedge}\left(A\overline{\wedge}A\right)
\end{array}                          |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|        \begin{array}{c}
\text{Zusammenhang}\\
\text{Konjunktion-NAND}
\end{array}         |       [prop:Zusammenhang-Konjunktion-NAND]        |                     \begin{array}{cc}
A\wedge B & \Leftrightarrow\\
\left(A\overline{\wedge}B\right)\overline{\wedge}\left(A\overline{\wedge}B\right)
\end{array}                      |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
     
][Gleitobjekt Tabelle:
[Tabelle 34: 
<tab:logische-Saetze-5>5. Tabelle der logischen Sätze
]

     
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                Bezeichnung                                  |                       Satz                        |                                                                                                                                                      logischer Satz                                                                                                                                                      |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{Zusammenhang}\\
\text{Disjunktion-NAND}
\end{array}  |       [prop:Zusammenhang-Disjunktion-NAND]        |                                                                                       \begin{array}{cc}
A\vee B & \Leftrightarrow\\
\left(A\overline{\wedge}A\right)\overline{\wedge}\left(B\overline{\wedge}B\right)
\end{array}                                                                                        |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{Zusammenhang}\\
\text{Implikation-NAND}
\end{array}  |       [prop:Zusammenhang-Implikation-NAND]        |                                                                                             \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\Rightarrow B\right) & \Leftrightarrow\\
A\overline{\wedge}\left(B\overline{\wedge}B\right)
\end{array}                                                                                             |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{Zusammenhang}\\
\text{Antivalenz-NAND}
\end{array}   | [prop:Zusammenhang-Antivalenz-NAND-Verknuepfung]  |                                            \begin{array}{c}
\left(A\nLeftrightarrow B\right)\Leftrightarrow\\
\left(A\overline{\wedge}\left(B\overline{\wedge}B\right)\right)\overline{\wedge}\\
\left(B\overline{\wedge}\left(A\overline{\wedge}A\right)\right)
\end{array}                                             |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{Zusammenhang}\\
\text{Äquivalenz-NAND}
\end{array}   |       [prop:Zusammenhang-Aequivalenz-NAND]        |                                         \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\Leftrightarrow B\right) & \Leftrightarrow\\
\left(\left(A\overline{\wedge}A\right)\overline{\wedge}\left(B\overline{\wedge}B\right)\right) & \overline{\wedge}\\
\left(A\overline{\wedge}B\right)
\end{array}                                          |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|     \begin{array}{c}
\text{Zusammenhang}\\
\text{NOR-NAND}
\end{array}      |    [prop:Zusammenhang-NOR-NAND-Verknuepfung]      | \begin{array}{c}
\left(A\overline{\vee}B\right)\Leftrightarrow\\
\left(\left(A\overline{\wedge}A\right)\overline{\wedge}\left(B\overline{\wedge}B\right)\right)\overline{\wedge}\\
\left(\left(A\overline{\wedge}A\right)\overline{\wedge}\left(B\overline{\wedge}B\right)\right)\phantom{\overline{\wedge}}
\end{array} |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|   \begin{array}{c}
\text{Zusammenhang}\\
\text{Negation-NOR}
\end{array}    |         [prop:Zusammenhang-Negation-NOR]          |                                                                                                                                         \neg A\Leftrightarrow A\overline{\vee}A                                                                                                                                          |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{Zusammenhang}\\
\text{Konjunktion-NOR}
\end{array}   | [prop:Zusammenhang-Konjunktion-NOR-Verknuepfung]  |                                                                                         \begin{array}{cc}
A\wedge B & \Leftrightarrow\\
\left(A\overline{\vee}A\right)\overline{\vee}\left(B\overline{\vee}B\right)
\end{array}                                                                                          |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|     \begin{array}{c}
\text{Zusammenhang}\\
\text{NAND-NOR}
\end{array}      |    [prop:Zusammenhang-NAND-NOR-Verknuepfung]      |              \begin{array}{c}
A\overline{\wedge}B\Leftrightarrow\\
\left(\left(A\overline{\vee}A\right)\overline{\vee}\left(B\overline{\vee}B\right)\right)\overline{\vee}\\
\left(\left(A\overline{\vee}A\right)\overline{\vee}\left(B\overline{\vee}B\right)\right)\phantom{\overline{\vee}}
\end{array}               |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{Zusammenhang}\\
\text{NAND-Implikation}
\end{array}  |      [prop:NAND-als-besondere-Implikation]        |                                                                                                          \begin{array}{cc}
A\overline{\wedge}B & \Leftrightarrow\\
\left(A\Rightarrow\neg B\right)
\end{array}                                                                                                           |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{Zusammenhang}\\
\text{NOR-Implikation}
\end{array}   |       [prop:NOR-als-besondere-Implikation]        |                                                                                                                           A\overline{\vee}B\Leftrightarrow\neg\left(\neg A\Rightarrow B\right)                                                                                                                           |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|  \begin{array}{c}
\text{Quantoren-}\\
\text{transformationen}
\end{array}   |         [prop:Quantorentransformationen]          |                                                                 \begin{array}{c}
\exists x\in M:\,A\Leftrightarrow\\
\neg\left(\forall x\in M:\,\neg A\right)\\
\forall x\in M:\,A\Leftrightarrow\\
\neg\left(\exists x\in M:\,\neg A\right)
\end{array}                                                                 |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
     
]Ich habe noch eine Art Hilfssätze formuliert und bewiesen. Diese 
sind an der Grenze dessen, was als sinnvoll erachtet werden kann. 
Trotzdem möchte ich diese an dieser Stelle ebenfalls noch 
auflisten.[Gleitobjekt Tabelle:
[Tabelle 35: 
<tab:logische-Saetze-6>6. Tabelle der logischen (Hilfs-)Sätze
]

     
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                    Bezeichnung                                      |                  Satz                    |                                                                   logischer Satz                                                                    |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|  \begin{array}{c}
\text{1. Substitutionssatz }\\
\text{der Negation}
\end{array}    |  [prop:1.-Substitutionssatz-Negation]    |                            \begin{array}{cc}
\neg A\wedge\left(B\Rightarrow A\right) & \Rightarrow\\
\neg B
\end{array}                             |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|  \begin{array}{c}
\text{2. Substitutionssatz }\\
\text{der Negation}
\end{array}    |  [prop:2.-Substitutionssatz-Negation]    |                          \begin{array}{cc}
\neg A\wedge\left(A\Leftrightarrow B\right) & \Rightarrow\\
\neg B
\end{array}                           |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{1. Substitutionssatz }\\
\text{der Konjunktion}
\end{array}  | [prop:1.-Substitutionssatz-Konjunktion]  |                         \begin{array}{cc}
A\wedge B\wedge\left(A\Rightarrow C\right) & \Rightarrow\\
C\wedge B
\end{array}                          |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{2. Substitutionssatz }\\
\text{der Konjunktion}
\end{array}  | [prop:2.-Substitutionssatz-Konjunktion]  |                         \begin{array}{cc}
A\wedge B\wedge\left(B\Rightarrow C\right) & \Rightarrow\\
A\wedge C
\end{array}                          |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{3. Substitutionssatz }\\
\text{der Konjunktion}
\end{array}  | [prop:3.-Substitutionssatz-Konjunktion]  |                       \begin{array}{cc}
A\wedge B\wedge\left(A\Leftrightarrow C\right) & \Rightarrow\\
C\wedge B
\end{array}                        |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{4. Substitutionssatz }\\
\text{der Konjunktion}
\end{array}  | [prop:4.-Substitutionssatz-Konjunktion]  |                       \begin{array}{cc}
A\wedge B\wedge\left(B\Leftrightarrow C\right) & \Rightarrow\\
A\wedge C
\end{array}                        |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{1. Substitutionssatz }\\
\text{der Disjunktion}
\end{array}  | [prop:1.-Substitutionssatz-Disjunktion]  |                     \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\vee B\right)\wedge\left(A\Rightarrow C\right) & \Rightarrow\\
C\vee B
\end{array}                     |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{2. Substitutionssatz }\\
\text{der Disjunktion}
\end{array}  | [prop:2.-Substitutionssatz-Disjunktion]  |                     \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\vee B\right)\wedge\left(B\Rightarrow C\right) & \Rightarrow\\
A\vee C
\end{array}                     |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{3. Substitutionssatz }\\
\text{der Disjunktion}
\end{array}  | [prop:3.-Substitutionssatz-Disjunktion]  |                   \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\vee B\right)\wedge\left(A\Leftrightarrow C\right) & \Rightarrow\\
C\vee B
\end{array}                   |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{4. Substitutionssatz }\\
\text{der Disjunktion}
\end{array}  | [prop:4.-Substitutionssatz-Disjunktion]  |                   \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\vee B\right)\wedge\left(B\Leftrightarrow C\right) & \Rightarrow\\
A\vee C
\end{array}                   |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{1. Substitutionssatz }\\
\text{der Implikation}
\end{array}  | [prop:1.-Substitutionssatz-Implikation]  |       \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\Rightarrow B\right)\wedge\left(C\Rightarrow A\right) & \Rightarrow\\
\left(C\Rightarrow B\right)
\end{array}        |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{2. Substitutionssatz }\\
\text{der Implikation}
\end{array}  |    [prop:Transitivitaet-Implikation]     |       \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\Rightarrow B\right)\wedge\left(B\Rightarrow C\right) & \Rightarrow\\
\left(A\Rightarrow C\right)
\end{array}        |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{3. Substitutionssatz }\\
\text{der Implikation}
\end{array}  | [prop:3.-Substitutionssatz-Implikation]  |     \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\Rightarrow B\right)\wedge\left(A\Leftrightarrow C\right) & \Rightarrow\\
\left(C\Rightarrow B\right)
\end{array}      |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{4. Substitutionssatz }\\
\text{der Implikation}
\end{array}  | [prop:4.-Substitutionssatz-Implikation]  |     \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\Rightarrow B\right)\wedge\left(B\Leftrightarrow C\right) & \Rightarrow\\
\left(A\Rightarrow C\right)
\end{array}      |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{1. Substitutionssatz }\\
\text{der Replikation}
\end{array}  | [prop:1.-Substitutionssatz-Antivalenz]   |        \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\Leftarrow B\right)\wedge\left(A\Rightarrow C\right) & \Rightarrow\\
\left(C\Leftarrow B\right)
\end{array}         |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{2. Substitutionssatz }\\
\text{der Replikation}
\end{array}  | [prop:2.-Substitutionssatz-Antivalenz]   |        \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\Leftarrow B\right)\wedge\left(C\Rightarrow B\right) & \Rightarrow\\
\left(A\Leftarrow C\right)
\end{array}         |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{3. Substitutionssatz }\\
\text{der Replikation}
\end{array}  | [prop:3.-Substitutionssatz-Replikation]  |      \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\Leftarrow B\right)\wedge\left(A\Leftrightarrow C\right) & \Rightarrow\\
\left(C\Leftarrow B\right)
\end{array}       |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{4. Substitutionssatz }\\
\text{der Replikation}
\end{array}  | [prop:4.-Substitutionssatz-Replikation]  |      \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\Leftarrow B\right)\wedge\left(B\Leftrightarrow C\right) & \Rightarrow\\
\left(A\Leftarrow C\right)
\end{array}       |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{Substitutionssatz }\\
\text{der Aequivalenz}
\end{array}
    |  [prop:Substitutionssatz-Aequivalenz]    | \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\Leftrightarrow B\right)\wedge\left(A\Leftrightarrow C\right) & \Rightarrow\\
\left(C\Leftrightarrow B\right)
\end{array}  |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{1. Substitutionssatz }\\
\text{der Antivalenz}
\end{array}   | [prop:1.-Substitutionssatz-Antivalenz]   | \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\nLeftrightarrow B\right)\wedge\left(A\Leftrightarrow C\right) & \Rightarrow\\
\left(A\Leftrightarrow B\right)
\end{array} |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \begin{array}{c}
\text{2. Substitutionssatz }\\
\text{der Antivalenz}
\end{array}   | [prop:2.-Substitutionssatz-Antivalenz]   | \begin{array}{cc}
\left(A\nLeftrightarrow B\right)\wedge\left(B\Leftrightarrow C\right) & \Rightarrow\\
\left(A\Leftrightarrow C\right)
\end{array} |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
